options.title: -n
options.description: No delay. If fn is locked by another process, setlock gives up.

options.title: -N
options.description: (Default.) Delay. If fn is locked by another process, setlock waits until it can obtain a new lock.

options.title: -x
options.description: If fn cannot be opened (or created) or locked, setlock exits zero.

options.title: -X
options.description: (Default.) If fn cannot be opened (or created) or locked, setlock prints an error message and exits nonzero.
